test.name: Test Use Case 1: User Registration and Profile Creation

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=planning_session, url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${HEADER} = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${PAYLOAD} = {'username': 'testuser_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]', 'email': 'test_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]@robot.com', 'password': 'ApiTestPass123', 'first_name': 'Robot', 'last_name'...
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/register/ path_url=/api/v1/auth/register/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '211'} body=b'{"username": "testuser_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]", "email": "test_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]@robot.com", "password": "ApiTestPass123", "first_name": "Robot", "last_name": "Tester"}'
HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/register/
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.status: HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/register/

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

test.status: HTTPError: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/register/

test.name: Test Use Case 2: Local User Login

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${HEADER} = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${PAYLOAD} = {'username': 'testuser_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]', 'password': 'ApiTestPass123'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/login/ path_url=/api/v1/auth/login/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '96'} body=b'{"username": "testuser_Generate Random String 8 [NUMBERS][LOWER]", "password": "ApiTestPass123"}'
HTTPError: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/login/
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.status: HTTPError: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/login/

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.status: HTTPError: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/auth/login/

test.name: Test Use Case 3: Create Calendar Entry (CRUD C)

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${HEADER} = {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${PAYLOAD} = {'category': 'MEET', 'title': 'Weekly Standup', 'start_time': '2025-10-06T10:00:00Z', 'end_time': '2025-10-06T11:00:00Z'}
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/calendar/ path_url=/api/v1/calendar/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '121'} body=b'{"category": "MEET", "title": "Weekly Standup", "start_time": "2025-10-06T10:00:00Z", "end_time": "2025-10-06T11:00:00Z"}'
HTTPError: 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/calendar/
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.status: HTTPError: 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/calendar/

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

test.status: HTTPError: 403 Client Error: Forbidden for url: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/calendar/
